ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Low and Energetic Charged Particle Composition and Anisotropy (SKA-2)
ResourceHeader.Description: This instrument makes measurements of the solar wind ion fluxes and energy-angular distributions of H+ and He++ around the Sun direction with high time resolution.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: Information about the Low and Energetic Charged Particle Composition and Anisotropy (SKA-2) experiment on the Interball Tail Probe mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: Low and Energetic Charged Particle Composition and Anisotropy (SKA-2) on Interball Tail Probe
